metadata.name: Fruta Noble
metadata.created_by: Hache De Henry ft. Monique Mizrahi + Barbara Piperno
metadata.description:
Fruta Noble is the fourth part of Mors Of Corazón and also a manifestation of gratitude to Ecuador and to each place that welcomes us as our own home.  
-  
Directed by Hache De Henry 
Music by Monique Mizrahi  
Charango, Guitarra & Voz by Monique Mizrahi  
Flauta Alto by Barbara Piperno  
Con la aparición estelar de Zory Pacheco & Hegoz  
-

• MORS OF CORAZÓN is an audiovisual experience about the journey we travel together when we intend to restart the feeling by Hache De Henry

| 2022 |
